articles.author: Kevin Purdy
articles.title: iOS 18 brings RCS to major carrier iPhones, but prepaid plans are still waiting - Ars Technica
articles.description: A future iOS update may be needed to unlock better Apple-to-Android messages.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ Illustration of a person who refuses to check their iPhone's messages until RCS is enabled on their MVNO carrier, out of respect for their Android-toting friends and family.
13
The future … [+4442 chars]
